title: Emerald Radiance Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Natural Emeralds. Crafted with meticulous detail and finished with a durable Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A contemporary take on the classic Haaram, this necklace features delicate floral motifs intricately set with dazzling diamonds. The design incorporates a scalloped bib with interspersed emeralds adding a touch of traditional charm. The floral pendants dangling below enhance the neckline, creating a captivating cascade of light.
colors: Vibrant Green (Emeralds). The rose gold provides a warm
romantic contrast to the cool brilliance of the diamonds and the deep green of the emeralds.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for gifting during weddings
or milestone celebrations. A statement piece that elevates any attire.
description: This Diamond Haaram seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with timeless elegance. The carefully selected diamonds ensure maximum sparkle, while the vibrant emeralds add a touch of tradition and sophistication. It is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and makes a truly unforgettable gift.
